mapper.select: SELECT user_id as userId, user_pwd as userPwd, user_name as userName, nickname, email, created_at as createdAt, category, role FROM user;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (user_id, user_pwd, user_name, nickname, email, created_at, category, role) VALUES (#{userId}, #{userPwd}, #{userName}, #{nickname}, #{email}, now(), #{category}, #{role});
mapper.select: SELECT user_id as userId, user_pwd as userPwd, user_name as userName, nickname, email, created_at as createdAt, category, role FROM user WHERE user_id = #{userId}
